name: Deaths Maze (itch)
description:
Demo with more to come!

You take control of a spirit trapped in Deaths mazes. Use your glosticks to light up the darkness and your shooting abilities to take down Deaths ghoulish slaves. Rated A for Awesome!!!!!!!

Controls

WASD to move
LMB to fire hold to extend
RMB to throw your ghost stick, hold in to extend the range then let go for globurst

Hope you enjoy!
